content:
As far as I can understand it is possible to bind a string element to a controlled list of texts.
If in the case of list of oid/uri I can figure out how to build the value set to be bound to that element;
it is not clear to me how does it work for lists of strings including white spaces.
Have you some example I can look at ?
not particularly but it's not really different
These were my doubts: (1) I thought that a 'code' cannot include whitespaces, but I saw that FHIR code allows for this; (2) still not sure about the system uri I should use for generic strings.
hmm. I'm not sure what'll happen with whitespace.
